document.full_text: a hepatitis c drug from vertex pharmaceuticals inc cured more patients than previously reported, u.s. health reviewers said, boosting the approval chances for a pill expected to transform treatment of the liver-destroying disease that afflicts millions.
document.title: fda backs vertex hepatitis drug efficacy, shares jump
lines_and_colors: a hepatitis c drug from vertex pharmaceuticals inc cured more patients than previously reported, u.s. health reviewers said, boosting the approval chances for a pill expected to transform treatment of the liver-destroying disease that afflicts millions.
